mapper.select:
SELECT *,goods.name as goodsName from receive_stock left join goods on receive_stock.goods_id = goods.id
and goods.name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into receive_stock(id, goods_id, num, channel, comment,delivery_time,single_price,receive_name) values (#{id}, #{goodsId}, #{num}, #{channel}, #{comment},#{deliveryTime},#{singlePrice},#{receiveName})
